citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00am on 14-JUN-
23. A family member stated the licensee was not at home but would return at noon. The licensee called the inspector and
stated he would also be gone in the afternoon.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00am on 14-JUN-
23. A family member stated the licensee was not at home but would return at noon. The licensee called the inspector and 
stated he would also be gone in the afternoon. 
 
 
End Section
